niggle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if something niggles you, you keep worrying about it or feeling annoyed about it and you cannot forget it
niggle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Something’s been niggling her all day.
It niggles me that we can’t go home yet and get warm.
niggle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to argue or make criticisms about small unimportant details
niggle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She niggled over every detail of the bill.
